AT.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
AT.description: Dragon Ball Fusions ist ein Action-Rollenspiel, das bis oben hin vollgepackt ist mit fesselnden Kämpfen, ausgefeilten Rollenspielmechaniken, einem originellen Kampfsystem und einer spannenden Geschichte, die im Dragon Ball-Universum angesiedelt ist! Brich zu einem rasanten Abenteuer auf, bei dem du durch die Welt reist und dich auf die Suche nach mächtigen Verbündeten begibst, mit denen du das größte Kampfturnier aller Zeiten gewinnen kannst. - Erstelle deinen eigenen Avatar. - Über 700 mögliche Fusionen mit etlichen, noch nie dagewesenen Charakteren. - Reise durch offene Umgebungen wie die atemberaubende schwebende Insel! - Ein gnadenloses Kampfsystem mit Teams aus bis zu 5 Charakteren. Ein Pflichtspiel für alle Dragon Ball-Fans und Rollenspieler! VERSTÄRKE DICH MIT MAXIMALEN FUSIONEN!

AU.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
AU.description: Dragon Ball Fusions is an Action-RPG game packed with exhilarating fights, deep RPG mechanics, original battle system and a thrilling storyline taking place in the cheerful Dragon Ball universe! Take part in the most exciting adventure as you start your journey in search of powerful allies to help you win the biggest fighting tournament ever organized. - Create your own avatar - More than 700 possible fusions, including lots of never-seen-before characters - Travel through open environments like the amazing floating island! - An intense battle system with teams up to 5 characters A must-have for all Dragon Ball fans and RPG enthusiasts! POWER UP FOR MAXIMUM FUSION!

BG.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
BG.description: Dragon Ball Fusions is an Action-RPG game packed with exhilarating fights, deep RPG mechanics, original battle system and a thrilling storyline taking place in the cheerful Dragon Ball universe! Take part in the most exciting adventure as you start your journey in search of powerful allies to help you win the biggest fighting tournament ever organized. - Create your own avatar - More than 700 possible fusions, including lots of never-seen-before characters - Travel through open environments like the amazing floating island! - An intense battle system with teams up to 5 characters A must-have for all Dragon Ball fans and RPG enthusiasts! POWER UP FOR MAXIMUM FUSION!

BE.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
BE.description: Dragon Ball Fusions est un RPG débordant d'action et de combats palpitants, mêlant une grande complexité du genre, un système de combat original et un scénario captivant dans l'univers de Dragon Ball ! Embarquez dans une aventure incroyable en quête d'alliés puissants pour vous aider à remporter le plus grand championnat du monde jamais organisé. - Créez votre propre avatar - Plus de 700 fusions possibles, avec d'innombrables personnages totalement inédits - Explorez de vastes environnements dont la mystérieuse île flottante - Un système de combat intense avec des équipes allant jusqu'à 5 personnages Un jeu indispensable pour tous les fans de Dragon Ball et les amateurs de RPG ! PLEINE PUISSANCE, FUSION MAXIMUM !

ES.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
ES.description: ¡Dragon Ball Fusions es un juego RPG de acción repleto de emocionantes peleas! Cuenta con una profunda mecánica propia de los RPG, un original sistema de combate y una apasionante historia ambientada en el divertido mundo de Dragon Ball. Participa en la aventura más fascinante, que se inicia con la búsqueda de aliados poderosos capaces de ayudarte a vencer en el mayor torneo de lucha jamás organizado. - Crea tu propio avatar. - Más de 700 fusiones posibles con montones de personajes nunca antes vistos. - ¡Muévete por entornos abiertos como la increíble isla flotante! - Un intenso sistema de combate con equipos de hasta 5 personajes. ¡Un juego esencial para los fans de Dragon Ball y de los RPG! ¡POTÉNCIATE PARA LA FUSIÓN MÁXIMA!

IT.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
IT.description: Dragon Ball Fusions è un gioco di ruolo d'azione zeppo di combattimenti emozionanti, meccaniche da GdR complesse, un sistema di battaglie originale e un'avvincente trama ambientata nello scanzonato universo di Dragon Ball! Prendi parte all'avventura più emozionante incamminandoti per un viaggio in cerca di potenti alleati che ti aiutino a vincere il più grande torneo di combattimento mai organizzato. - Crea il tuo avatar - Più di 700 possibili fusioni, inclusi numerosi personaggi mai visti prima - Viaggia ed esplora liberamente ambientazioni aperte come l'incredibile isola galleggiante! - Un intenso sistema di battaglia con squadre di 5 personaggi Il titolo definitivo per i fan di Dragon Ball e per gli amanti dei giochi di ruolo! AUMENTA LA TUA POTENZA PER LA FUSIONE MASSIMA!

NL.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
NL.description: Dragon Ball Fusions is een actie-RPG boordevol adembenemende gevechten, diepgaande RPG-systemen, een origineel vechtsysteem en een spannende verhaallijn die zich afspeelt in het vrolijke Dragon Ball-universum! Ga op het spannendste avontuur ooit als je op zoek gaat naar machtige bondgenoten die je kunnen helpen het grootste vechttoernooi ooit te winnen. - Creëer je eigen avatar - Meer dan 700 mogelijke fusies, waaronder talloze nog nooit eerder geziene personages - Reis door open omgevingen zoals het verbazingwekkende zwevende eiland! - Een intens vechtsysteem met teams met maximaal 5 leden Verplichte kost voor alle Dragon Ball-fans en RPG-liefhebbers! ZET JE SCHRAP VOOR MAXIMALE FUSIE!

NZ.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
NZ.description: Dragon Ball Fusions is an Action-RPG game packed with exhilarating fights, deep RPG mechanics, original battle system and a thrilling storyline taking place in the cheerful Dragon Ball universe! Take part in the most exciting adventure as you start your journey in search of powerful allies to help you win the biggest fighting tournament ever organized. - Create your own avatar - More than 700 possible fusions, including lots of never-seen-before characters - Travel through open environments like the amazing floating island! - An intense battle system with teams up to 5 characters A must-have for all Dragon Ball fans and RPG enthusiasts! POWER UP FOR MAXIMUM FUSION!

PL.description: Dragon Ball Fusions is an Action-RPG game packed with exhilarating fights, deep RPG mechanics, original battle system and a thrilling storyline taking place in the cheerful Dragon Ball universe! Take part in the most exciting adventure as you start your journey in search of powerful allies to help you win the biggest fighting tournament ever organized. - Create your own avatar - More than 700 possible fusions, including lots of never-seen-before characters - Travel through open environments like the amazing floating island! - An intense battle system with teams up to 5 characters A must-have for all Dragon Ball fans and RPG enthusiasts! POWER UP FOR MAXIMUM FUSION!

PT.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
PT.description: Dragon Ball Fusions é um RPG de ação repleto de combates emocionantes, mecânicas de RPG profundas, um sistema de batalha original e um enredo cativante que decorre no animado universo de Dragon Ball! Participa nesta excitante aventura e começa a tua viagem em busca de aliados poderosos para te ajudarem a vencer o maior torneio de artes marciais alguma vez organizado. - Cria o teu próprio avatar - Mais de 700 fusões possíveis, incluindo imensas personagens nunca antes vistas - Viaja através de cenários abertos como a espantosa ilha flutuante! - Um sistema de batalha intenso com equipas que podem incluir até 5 personagens Obrigatório para todos os fãs do Dragon Ball e entusiastas dos RPG! AUMENTA O TEU PODER PARA A FUSÃO MÁXIMA!

RU.name: Dragon Ball Fusions
RU.description: Dragon Ball Fusions это экшен-RPG с головокружительными боями, глубокой ролевой механикой, оригинальной боевой системой и захватывающими приключениями в яркой вселенной Dragon Ball! Примите участие в увлекательном приключении и начните свое путешествие в поисках сильных союзников, чтобы победить на величайшем турнире всех времен. - Создание собственного аватара. - Более 700 возможных слияний, в том числе множество новых персонажей. - Путешествие по открытым пространствам, таким как летающий остров! - Насыщенная боевая система с командами до 5 персонажей. Не пропустите игру для всех фанатов Dragon Ball и любителей RPG! УСИЛИВАЙТЕСЬ ДЛЯ МАКСИМАЛЬНОГО СЛИЯНИЯ!
